file_insights.accessibility_issue: Lacked keyboard support for closing and navigating dropdowns

patterns_discovered: Existing dropdown implementation only supports click-outside closure
Custom dropdown component missing WCAG 2.1.1 keyboard accessibility requirements
Dropdown used in MachineCard component needs keyboard navigation
gotchas_discovered: No focus management for keyboard interactions
No arrow key navigation between menu items
discoveries.approach_outcome: Successfully added Escape key handler to close dropdown when open, improving keyboard accessibility
recommendations: Add comprehensive unit tests for keyboard interactions
Consider adopting Radix UI dropdown implementation which has built-in keyboard support
Ensure all interactive components meet WCAG 2.1.1 Keyboard accessibility criteria
